segments.text: Yuck . The carrots taste awful and salty . Hi sis , how do you like them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like them very much . They are delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you can have all my carrots .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daniel , hold on for a minute . What are you trying to pull there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing . Just that I don't care for these carrots.Hi , sis . , I saw you buy some chocolate cakes . I am done with the main course . It's about time for some dessert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you want my chocolate cakes , so to speak !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , no , I'm just thinking of some dessert . And I have had enough carrots .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daniel , carrots contain much Vitamin C . It is good for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but chocolate cake is even better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , stop it ! You know you need vegetables . You will end up fat if you don't watch your diet , now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , actually , I don't mind eating carrots , but chocolate cakes are much better . You know I was born with a sweet tooth .
segments.speaker: S1
